Package voicesplitting.voice.hmm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HmmVoiceSplittingModel
    This is the Voice Splitting algorithm submitted to ISMIR 2015.
    HmmVoiceSplittingModelParameters
    The parameters to use for an HmmVoiceSplittingModel.
    HmmVoiceSplittingModelState
    A State is used by the HmmVoiceSplittingModel and contains a List of the Voices which are currently present in the HMM as well as its cumulative probability so far.
    HmmVoiceSplittingModelTester
    A HmmVoiceSplittingModelTester tests the VoiceSplittingModel class.
    HmmVoiceSplittingModelTesterReturn
    The return object for a HmmVoiceSplittingModelTester thread.
